Name: Military Saber
Description: A remnant of the distant past. According to legends, this was the weapon used by the hero who prevented the ambush at the valley that might've made the republic lost the first world war.

DescriptionLocalization.zh: 来自遥远过去的遗物。这是传说中英雄使用的武器，他在山谷中阻止了一次可能使共和国在第一次世界大战中失败的伏击。
